sentence: What did the cork say to the bottle? if you dont behave yourself, ill plug you.
explanation: A plug refers to a piece that obstructs an opening.
first_new_sentence: The plumber used a plug to seal the drain.
second_new_sentence: The electric car needs to plug into a charging station to recharge its batteries.

sentence: I lost my only son today. ha! talk about a bad heir day.
explanation: An heir is someone who is entitled to receive the property or position of someone upon their death.
first_new_sentence: The heir to the throne attended the royal ceremony.
second_new_sentence: The lawyer prepared the will for the deceaseds heir.
